about_the_game:
《No Furry Control》 is a game developed by さんかっけい and TJacky, featuring art and programming created by the two.

They invited RO to participate in the illustration of the BOSS.

In the game, you will play as a researcher, venturing into the depths to defeat and heal the infected.

You will engage in battles with multiple enemies, acquire cards to strengthen your character, and defeat enemies to obtain CG.

■CG

The game is presented as a turn-based card RPG, where you will interact with characters and scenes on the map, and interact with beast girls to unlock multiple animated CGs.

It also includes a few puzzle elements, all played in a pixel art style.

■Battle

content_descriptors.notes: This game is a pixel-style card game where the protagonist wakes up in a mysterious room and utilizes the power of healing sperm to challenge beast girls and monsters in order to obtain stronger cards. The ultimate goal is to reach the core of the infection.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10/11 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
